00042 CLexiconReadWindow::CLexiconReadWindow(ListCSwordModuleInfo moduleList, CMDIArea* parent, const char *name) : CReadWindow(moduleList, parent,name) {
00043     setKey( CSwordKey::createInstance(moduleList.first()) );
00044     key()->key("");
00045 }

00048 }

00059 void CLexiconReadWindow::insertKeyboardActions( KAccel* a ){
00060     a->insert("Next entry",     i18n("Next entry"),     "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, 0, "", true, true);
00061     a->insert("Previous entry", i18n("Previous entry"), "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, 0, "", true, true);   
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CLexiconReadWindow::initKeyboardActions() {
00065   CReadWindow::initKeyboardActions();
00066 
00067 
00068   CBTConfig::setupAccel(CBTConfig::lexiconWindow, accel());
00069   insertKeyboardActions(accel());
00070   accel()->readSettings();
00071 
00072   accel()->setSlot("Next entry", this, SLOT(nextEntry()));
00073   accel()->setSlot("Previous entry",  this, SLOT(previousEntry()));
00074 };

00077 void CLexiconReadWindow::initConnections(){
00078 //  connect(displayWidget(), SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)),
00079 //      this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00080 //  connect(displayWidget(), SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&, const QString&)),
00081 //      this, SLOT(referenceDropped(const QString&, const QString&)));
00082 
00083     connect(keyChooser(), SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00084         this, SLOT(lookup(CSwordKey*)));
00085 }

00087 void CLexiconReadWindow::initView(){
00088     qWarning("CLexiconReadWindow::initView()");
00089     setMainToolBar( new KToolBar(this) );
00090     Q_ASSERT( mainToolBar() );
00091     addDockWindow(mainToolBar());
00092 
00093     setKeyChooser( CKeyChooser::createInstance(modules().first(), key(), mainToolBar()) );
00094     mainToolBar()->insertWidget(0,keyChooser()->sizeHint().width(),keyChooser());   
00095     mainToolBar()->setItemAutoSized(0);
00096 
00097     setModuleChooserBar( new CModuleChooserBar(modules(), modules().first()->type(), this) );
00098     addDockWindow( moduleChooserBar() );
00099     setDisplayWidget( CDisplay::createReadInstance(this) );     
00100     setCentralWidget( displayWidget()->view() );
00101 
00102     setIcon(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()));
00103 }
00104 
00105 void CLexiconReadWindow::setupPopupMenu(){
00106     popup()->insertTitle(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()), i18n("Bible window"));
00107 
00108     m_actions.selectAll = new KAction(i18n("Select all"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(selectAll()), actionCollection());
00109   m_actions.selectAll->plug(popup());
00110 
00111   (new KActionSeparator())->plug( popup() );
00112 
00113     m_actions.copyMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Copy..."), ICON_EDIT_COPY);  
00114     m_actions.copy.entryOnly = new KAction(i18n("Entry"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorOnly()), actionCollection());
00115     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.entryOnly);
00116     m_actions.copy.textOnly = new KAction(i18n("Text of entry"), KShortcut(0),displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorTextOnly()), actionCollection()); 
00117     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.textOnly);
00118     m_actions.copy.entryAndText = new KAction(i18n("Entry with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00119     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.entryAndText);    
00120   m_actions.copyMenu->insert(new KActionSeparator());   
00121     m_actions.copy.selectedText = new KAction(i18n("Selected text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copySelection()),actionCollection());
00122     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.selectedText);
00123     m_actions.copyMenu->plug(popup());
00124 
00125     m_actions.saveMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Save..."),ICON_FILE_SAVE);   
00126     m_actions.save.entryAsPlain = new KAction(i18n("Entry as plain text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsPlain()),actionCollection());
00127     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.entryAsPlain);
00128     m_actions.save.entryAsHTML = new KAction(i18n("Entry as HTML"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsHTML()),actionCollection());
00129     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.entryAsHTML);
00130     m_actions.saveMenu->plug(popup());
00131 
00132     m_actions.printMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Print..."),ICON_FILE_PRINT);    
00133     m_actions.print.entryAndText = new KAction(i18n("Entry with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00134     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.entryAndText);  
00135     m_actions.printMenu->plug(popup());
00136 }
00137 
00139 void CLexiconReadWindow::updatePopupMenu(){
00140     
00141   m_actions.copy.entryOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );   
00142     m_actions.copy.textOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );  
00143     m_actions.copy.entryAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00144     m_actions.copy.selectedText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasSelection() );
00145 }
00146 
00148 void CLexiconReadWindow::nextEntry(){
00149   keyChooser()->setKey(ldKey()->NextEntry());
00150 }
00151 
00153 void CLexiconReadWindow::previousEntry(){
00154   keyChooser()->setKey(ldKey()->PreviousEntry());
00155 }
00156 
00158 CSwordLDKey* CLexiconReadWindow::ldKey(){
00159   qWarning("CLexiconReadWindow::key()");
00160     CSwordLDKey* k = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(CDisplayWindow::key());
00161     Q_ASSERT(k);
00162     return k;
00163 }
